main.name: Narindra Arifta Antoko
main.description: Hello, I am a Junior Frontend Developer
main.bio: I am a graduate of information systems. Interested in the world of programming and computers. Joined a technology student community while studying to improve my skills. Loved the modern and attractive website interface. Once developed a training registration website during an internship at BPSDMP Kominfo Surabaya. Coding using CSS, HTML, ReactJs and currently learning website development with a backend using Golang.

education.description1: Pernah mengikuti komunitas pada kampus yang bernama Ma-tech dengan posisi Devisi Dalam Negeri.
education.description2: Membantu memberikan ide-ide untuk event yang akan di adakan oleh komunitas baik untuk masyarakat sekitar kampus ataupun adik-adik SMA/SMK yang ingin belajar.

experience.title: Internship Web Programmer
experience.description1: Create a website program for registration of training and education with the team according to the wishes and directions.
experience.description2: Design and develop the interface and interaction between users and websites for training and education registration using bootstrap.
experience.description3: Develop and integrate website backends such as databases with the interface that has been created.

projects.title: BPSDMP Kominfo website for training registration
